modules.description: Converts colors between RGB and HSLuv color spaces, calculates color brightness, and adjusts saturation while preserving hue and lightness. Operates on tuples representing RGB values (0-255) and HSLuv values (hue 0-360, saturation 0-100, lightness 0-100). Used to ensure consistent color appearance in UI elements and to generate visually balanced color schemes for data charts.

The module offers bidirectional conversion functions between color spaces such as RGB, HSLuv, HPLuv, XYZ, Luv, and LCh, along with hex string parsing and formatting, using structured record types to ensure type safety and accuracy. It includes pretty-printers for visualizing color values in various formats, enabling applications like color manipulation in graphics pipelines or precise color representation in user interfaces. Specific use cases include converting between perceptually uniform color models and standard RGB for design workflows or data visualization.

Converts between float triples and color space values in Hsluv, including HSLUV, HPLUV, RGB, XYZ, LUV, and LCH. Each function maps directly between a tuple of three floats and a structured color representation. Used for color space transformations in graphics and visualization workflows.
